div.pre: 1176 Gordium, Phrygia, 1963 Burial: c. 610 B.C. (Bellinger) Contents: 45 EL. From excavations Lydia (lion hd.): 26 thirds; 1 sixth; 18 twelfths Disposition: Ankara Young, AJA 1964, p. 283 â€ Bellinger, Essays Robinson, pp. 10-5, illus.
